learningOutcomes: Frontend development endru enna nu clear understanding
HTML, CSS, JavaScript roles differentiate panna theriyum
lesson.intro: Indha lesson frontend development-ku foundation. Website open pannumbodhu screen-la kaattura ellame frontend. Indha frontend eppadi build aagudhu nu purinjukka indha lesson romba important.
deepExplanation: Frontend development-na user interact pannra part. Browser-la kaattura UI ellame frontend. Idhula moonu core technologies irukku: HTML, CSS, JavaScript.
HTML (HyperText Markup Language) website skeleton. Heading, paragraph, image, button ellam HTML-la define pannuvom.
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) indha skeleton-ku look & feel kudukkum. Colors, layout, spacing, animations ellam CSS responsibility.
JavaScript website-ku brain. User click pannina enna nadakkanum, data change aagumbodhu UI update aaguradhu, backend-kitta data fetch pannradhu ellam JavaScript.
Real website-la indha moonum separate-ah illa; together work pannum.
lesson.realWorldAnalogy: HTML = building structure, CSS = paint & interior, JavaScript = electricity & switches
commonMistakes: HTML, CSS, JS ellam same nu nenachukaradhu
JavaScript direct start pannitu basics skip pannradhu

practice.easy: HTML, CSS, JS roles explain pannunga
practice.medium: Simple HTML + CSS page create pannunga
practice.challenge: Button click alert varra JS add pannunga

lesson.summary: Frontend development foundation indha moonu technologies. Idhu clear irundha next lessons smooth-aa pogum.

learningOutcomes: Simple webpage build panna confidence varum
lesson.intro: HTML basics website create panna first practical step. Indha lesson-la tags, elements, structure ellam deep-ah paakkalaam.
deepExplanation:
HTML tag browser-kku instruction kudukkum. Example:

heading nu sollum,

paragraph nu sollum.

HTML element = opening tag + content + closing tag. Example:

Hello

.
HTML document-ku fixed structure irukku: doctype, html, head, body.
Correct structure use pannina dhaan browser error illaama render pannum.
lesson.summary: HTML basics strong irundha frontend journey smooth-aagum.

learningOutcomes: Simple layouts design panna confidence varum
lesson.intro: HTML skeleton-ku life kudukkuradhu CSS. Indha lesson-la styling basics deep-ah paakkalaam.
deepExplanation: CSS website appearance control pannum. Color, font, spacing, alignment ellam CSS-la decide pannuvom.
CSS selector use panni HTML elements target pannuvom.
Inline, internal, external CSS nu types irukku. Real projects-la external CSS best.
CSS proper-ah use pannina website professional-a theriyum.
lesson.summary: CSS basics strong irundha advanced design easy-aagum.

learningOutcomes: Basic logic write panna confidence varum
lesson.intro: HTML structure, CSS design apram website-ku life kudukkuradhu JavaScript. Indha lesson-la JavaScript basics deep-ah paakkalaam.
deepExplanation: JavaScript website interaction handle pannum. User click pannina enna nadakkanum, data eppadi change aagum ellam JS decide pannum.
JavaScript-la variables, conditions, functions use panni logic build pannuvom.
DOM (Document Object Model) moolama JavaScript HTML elements access pannum.
Events-na user actions. Click, keypress, submit ellam events.
lesson.summary: JavaScript basics strong irundha frontend powerful-aagum.

learningOutcomes: HTML, CSS, JS together use panna theriyum
Small real website build panna confidence
lesson.intro: Indha mini project frontend basics ellam combine panna use pannum. Real project experience idhu.
deepExplanation: Project panna learning strong aagum. Indha project-la HTML structure, CSS styling, JS interaction ellam use pannuvom.
Responsive design-na desktop, mobile ellathulayum site nalla kaattanum.
Problem solve panna approach improve aagum.

example.code: Landing page with navbar, section, button click alert

commonMistakes: Perfect design try pannitu stuck aaguradhu
lesson.summary: Mini project complete pannina frontend fundamentals solid-aagum.

lesson.intro: Java oru powerful, platform-independent programming language. Indha lesson Java basics introduce pannum.
deepExplanation: Java write once, run anywhere principle follow pannum.
JDK = Java Development Kit (coding tools)
JRE = Java Runtime Environment (run panna)
JVM = Java Virtual Machine (platform independent execution)
Java backend, Android, enterprise apps ellathulayum use aagudhu.
lesson.summary: Java introduction strong irundha next lessons easy-aagum.

lesson.intro: Program write pannumbodhu data store panna variables use pannuvom. Indha lesson Java variables & data types deep-ah explain pannum.
deepExplanation: Variable-na data store panna oru container. Java strongly typed language; variable type munna define pannanum.
Primitive data types: byte, short, int, long, float, double, char, boolean.
Non-primitive data types: String, Array, Class, Object.
Correct data type choose pannina memory efficient & bug-free code write panna mudiyum.

conceptBreakdown.explanation: One type to another type convert pannradhu

practice.challenge: User input read panni calculation pannunga

lesson.summary: Variables & data types Java foundation. Idhu strong irundha logic easy.

lesson.intro: Java oru Object-Oriented Programming language. Indha lesson OOP basics explain pannum.
deepExplanation: Class blueprint. Object real instance. OOP real-world problems model panna help pannum.
Encapsulation data hide pannum.
Inheritance reuse code. Child class parent properties inherit pannum.
Polymorphism flexibility kudukkum.
lesson.realWorldAnalogy: Class = blueprint, Object = house built from blueprint
lesson.summary: OOP Java power. Idhu master pannina real apps easy.

learningOutcomes: Java concepts real project-la apply panna confidence
lesson.intro: Theory mattum podhuma? Project dhaan real learning. Indha lesson Java mini project guide pannum.
deepExplanation: Console based project beginners-ku best.
Variables, loops, conditions, OOP ellam integrate pannuvom.
Project structure think panna habit varum.

example.code:
System.out.println("1. Add Student");
System.out.println("2. View Students");

lesson.summary: Mini project complete pannina Java fundamentals solid.

learningOutcomes: Python enna, enga use aagudhu nu puriyum
lesson.intro: Python oru beginner-friendly, powerful programming language. Indha lesson Python journey-ku starting point.
deepExplanation: Python readable syntax use pannum, so beginners-ku easy.
Web development, data science, AI, automation ellathulayum Python use aagudhu.
Python interpreted language; compile step illa.
Indentation Python-la rule; idhu code readability improve pannum.

conceptBreakdown.explanation: Block define panna spaces use pannum

lesson.summary: Python introduction strong irundha next lessons smooth.

learningOutcomes: Decision making & looping logic build panna mudiyum
lesson.intro: Program logic build panna variables, conditions, loops core role play pannum.
deepExplanation: Python-la variable declare panna type specify panna vendam.
If condition decision making-ku use.
Loops repetitive tasks-ku use.
Functions code reuse panna help pannum.
lesson.summary: Variables & loops Python backbone.

learningOutcomes: Python data structures use panna theriyum
lesson.intro: Single value pothaadhu; multiple values handle panna data structures use pannuvom.
deepExplanation: List ordered, mutable collection.
Tuple ordered but immutable.
Dictionary key-value pairs store pannum.
Correct data structure choose pannina performance improve aagum.
lesson.summary: Python data structures real applications-ku base.

learningOutcomes: Python concepts real project-la apply panna confidence
lesson.intro: Theory mattum pothaadhu. Indha mini project Python basics ellam practical-aa use pannum.
deepExplanation: Project-based learning beginners-ku best.
Variables, loops, conditions, data structures ellam integrate pannuvom.
Error handling & clean output important.

example.code:
print('1. Add Expense')
print('2. View Total')

lesson.summary: Mini project complete pannina Python fundamentals solid.

learningOutcomes: Node.js enna, enga use aagudhu nu puriyum
Client vs Server difference clear aagum
Simple Node server run panna confidence
lesson.intro: JavaScript browser-la mattum illa. Server-side-la run panna Node.js use pannuvom.
deepExplanation: Node.js JavaScript runtime built on Chrome V8 engine.
Event-driven, non-blocking I/O – fast & scalable.
Backend APIs, real-time apps (chat) create panna use aagum.
NPM packages ecosystem romba strong.
lesson.summary: Node.js backend world-ku entry ticket.

learningOutcomes: Basic REST API build panna mudiyum
lesson.intro: Node.js raw-aa irundhaalum Express framework backend development easy pannum.
deepExplanation: Express lightweight Node.js framework.
Routing moolama different URLs handle pannuvom.
Middleware request-response cycle control pannum.
REST APIs build panna Express best choice.
lesson.summary: Express basics strong irundha backend powerful-aagum.

lesson.intro: Modern web applications-la frontend & backend communicate pannradhu REST API moolama. Indha lesson REST fundamentals deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: REST = Representational State Transfer. Idhu oru architectural style.
API endpoints HTTP methods use pannum: GET (read), POST (create), PUT/PATCH (update), DELETE (remove).
Stateless communication – each request independent.
JSON format common data exchange medium.

example.code:
app.get('/users', (req, res) => res.json(users));
app.post('/users', (req, res) => res.json({msg:'Created'}));

practice.challenge: Full CRUD API with in-memory data

lesson.summary: REST API backend backbone.

learningOutcomes: REST API real project-la apply panna confidence
lesson.intro: Theory complete aana apram backend mini project real learning kudukkum.
deepExplanation: Indha project-la Express + REST API concepts integrate pannuvom.
CRUD operations full cycle understand aagum.
Postman use panni API test pannalaam.
lesson.summary: Backend mini project complete pannina Node + Express solid.

learningOutcomes: Relational DB vs MongoDB compare panna mudiyum
lesson.intro: Traditional SQL databases-ku alternative-ah MongoDB NoSQL database. Indha lesson MongoDB basics explain pannum.
deepExplanation: MongoDB document-based database.
Table-ku badhil collection, row-ku badhil document.
Schema flexible – fields vary aagalam.
JSON-like BSON format use pannum.
lesson.summary: MongoDB basics strong irundha backend powerful.

learningOutcomes: Compass & backend-la data manage panna confidence
lesson.intro: Database use panna theriyum-na CRUD operations theriyanum. Indha lesson MongoDB CRUD operations deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: CRUD = Create, Read, Update, Delete. Indha four operations ellame database life-cycle.
MongoDB-la insertOne / insertMany data create pannum.
find / findOne data read pannum.
updateOne / updateMany data modify pannum.
deleteOne / deleteMany data remove pannum.
Filters & operators correct-ah use pannina accurate results varum.
lesson.summary: CRUD operations MongoDB core skill.

learningOutcomes: Embedding vs referencing difference clear aagum
Scalable data model create panna confidence
lesson.intro: Schema-less nu sonnalum MongoDB-la proper schema design romba important.
deepExplanation: Schema design-na data eppadi store pannuvom nu plan pannradhu.
Embedding related data same document-la store pannum.
Referencing related data separate collection-la store panni ObjectId link use pannum.
Right choice application performance decide pannum.
lesson.summary: Good schema design = fast & scalable app.

lesson.intro: React modern frontend development-ku most popular library. Indha lesson React fundamentals introduce pannum.
deepExplanation: React component-based architecture follow pannum.
UI small reusable components-ah break pannuvom.
JSX JavaScript + HTML mix.
Virtual DOM performance improve pannum.
commonMistakes: Too much logic in one component
lesson.summary: React introduction frontend next level.

learningOutcomes: Props vs State difference clear-a puriyum
Data flow React-la eppadi nadakkudhu nu theriyum
lesson.intro: React application dynamic-a behave aaguradhu State & Props mela depend aagudhu. Indha lesson data handling deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: Props parent component-lendhu child component-kku data pass panna use pannuvom. Props read-only.
State component-kulla irukkura private data. useState hook moolama update pannuvom.
State update aagumbodhu React component re-render aagum.
Unidirectional data flow React strength.
commonMistakes: Too many states in one component
lesson.summary: State & Props React core pillars.

learningOutcomes: Error & loading state handle panna confidence
lesson.intro: Real React application backend data illama incomplete. Indha lesson API integration deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: API integration-na backend server-kitta HTTP request send pannradhu.
fetch / axios use panni data retrieve pannuvom.
useEffect hook lifecycle manage pannum.
Loading & error states user experience improve pannum.
lesson.summary: API integration React real-world usage.

lesson.intro: Coding start panna munna proper planning project success decide pannum.
deepExplanation: Project planning-na requirements collect pannradhu.
Architecture decide pannina confusion avoid pannalaam.
Frontend, backend, database roles clear-a define pannuvom.
Folder structure, API flow plan pannuvom.

example.code:
Frontend: React
Backend: Node.js
Database: MongoDB

lesson.summary: Good planning = successful project.

learningOutcomes: Frontend & backend connect panna full clarity
React-la real API data render panna confidence
lesson.intro: Backend ready-a irundhaalum frontend connect pannina dhaan application complete. Indha lesson frontend integration deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: Frontend integration-na backend API endpoints React components-la consume pannradhu.
Axios / fetch use panni HTTP requests send pannuvom.
Response data state-la store panni UI-la render pannuvom.
Authentication token, headers, params ellam integration stage-la important.
lesson.summary: Frontend integration application alive aagura stage.

learningOutcomes: Node server & MongoDB connect panna confidence
Mongoose schema & API flow clear aagum
lesson.intro: Backend integration-na application heart. Indha lesson Node.js + MongoDB integration deep-ah cover pannum.
deepExplanation: Node.js Express server MongoDB-kitta connect pannum.
Mongoose ODM use panni schema define pannuvom.
API requests database-la data save / fetch pannum.
Error handling, validation backend quality decide pannum.
lesson.summary: Backend integration app backbone.

lesson.intro: Local system-la run aagura project world-ku visible aaguradhu deployment. Indha lesson deployment process deep-ah explain pannum.
deepExplanation: Backend Render-la host pannalaam.
MongoDB Atlas cloud database provide pannum.
Environment variables production-la critical.
Build logs & errors read panna theriyanum.
lesson.summary: Deployment = project completion.

title: Print Hello World
description: Write a Java program to print Hello World
